name: Knowledge is Powah
description:
*RUN AS ADMINISTRATOR IF GAME CRASHES!!*

You are in a zombie apocalypse with no weapons but DO NOT WORRY for you have the greatest power.

THE POWER OF KNOWLEDGE.

You can share a particular set of knowledge with any inanimate object. That object will then behave as per the knowledge it has BUT only once.

Made by:-

Ershad Hussain, ershadzh7@gmail..com

Backtrace integration proof - https://share.backtrace.io/api/share/ss0c0CqG7YyMGx1Q5bx1sYw1
